mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RQ WHERE RQ_MMID = 'DOYOUNG' AND RQ_CODE = '5000210303092450'

INSERT INTO RQ(RQ_CODE, RQ_MMID, RQ_TITLE, RQ_COMMENT, RQ_FILTERCODE, RQ_SUBCODE, RQ_PERIOD, RQ_SYSDATE, RQ_STCODE, RQ_REGION) VALUES(#{rqCode},#{rqId},#{rqTitle},#{rqCommnet},#{rqFilterCode},#{rqSubCode},#{rqPeriod},#{sysdate},#{rqStCode},#{rqRegion)
